journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: Java Developer specialized in Spring Boot 3.5 and RESTful API architecture. 2,000+ development hours with production projects using Java 21, PostgreSQL, and enterprise practices. Pursuing Computer Science degree with focus on software engineering, data structures, and full-stack development. Unique background in international scientific research that brings analytical rigor and systematic methodology to complex problem-solving.
